ai-cp13:1.1_0: “I’m not ever to ask for a question,
ai-cp13:1.2_0: But I’m the one of great power,
ai-cp13:1.3_0: At that time I was a legitimate legal procedure,
ai-cp13:2.1_0: Then at that time I was living for the Dhamma.
ai-cp13:2.3_0: A snake charmer took a alms-bowl,
ai-cp13:4.1_0: make water for washing the feet.
ai-cp13:4.2_0: I could make a water strainer,
ai-cp13:4.3_0: I’d be able to do so.
ai-cp13:5.4_0: you won’t see the highest goal.
ai-cp13:7.1_0: the third group of traveling in Campā,
